description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget for a Birthdays screen, displaying a list of birthdays, handling empty states, and providing a button to add new birthdays via a dialog.

classes.name: BirthdaysScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that renders a screen showing a list of birthdays with an option to add new ones.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the BirthdaysScreen, including app bar, list of birthdays, and add button.
